Murfreesboro.Redeemer Classical Academy: Redeemer Classical Academy is a private school located in Murfreesboro, Tennessee, with a focus on Classical-Christian education. Redeemer Classical Academy serves students in kindergarten through 12th grade. The school's main objective is to employ traditional Classical methods and curricula and a Christ-centered approach to all aspects of the school life through a rigorous academic course of study and Christian discipleship.
